thread.title: Coca-Cola calls on Sepp Blatter to step down immediately
thread.title_full: Coca-Cola calls on Sepp Blatter to step down immediately - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Coca-Cola calls on Sepp Blatter to step down immediately
text:
Walter Bieri/AP Calling for 'urgent reform,' Cola-Cola calls for embattled FIFA boss Sepp Blatter to quit. ZURICH (AP) — Coca-Cola has become the first FIFA sponsor to call on Sepp Blatter to immediately stand down as president of world soccer’s governing body.
The intervention from the soft drinks giant comes a week after the FIFA president was placed under criminal investigation by the Swiss authorities.
Coca-Cola says it is “calling for FIFA President Joseph Blatter to step down immediately so that a credible and sustainable reform process can begin in earnest.”
Darrin Vanselow/Business Wire Coca-Cola is a key FIFA World Cup sponsor. The company added: “Every day that passes, the image and reputation of FIFA continues to tarnish. FIFA needs comprehensive and urgent reform, and that can only be accomplished through a truly independent approach.”
